questions.prompt: Based on the trial data so far, are there any emerging safety signals in the lab panels?

ground_truth.canonical_answer: ALT values are creeping upward in a subset of patients, specifically those on concomitant statin therapy. The elevations are still below protocol action thresholds but the trend across multiple weeks is notable.
